DBLP:conf/icwsm/NguyenLTSCKX22.title: Mapping Topics in 100, 000 Real-Life Moral Dilemmas
DBLP:conf/icwsm/NguyenLTSCKX22.author:
Tuan Dung Nguyen and
Georgiana Lyall and
Alasdair Tran and
Minjeong Shin and
Nicholas George Carroll and
Colin Klein and
Lexing Xie
DBLP:conf/icwsm/NguyenLTSCKX22.paperMotivationText: Moral dilemmas play an important role in theorizing about ethical norms and moral psychology.
DBLP:conf/icwsm/NguyenLTSCKX22.paperContributionText: The authors create a corpus of reddit threads from the subreddit r/AITA (moral dilemmas) and apply topic modelling to determine 47 fine-grained topics in the corpus. In an analysis, they also investigate the presence of words from the MFD in the corpus.
DBLP:conf/icwsm/NguyenLTSCKX22.paperResultsText: They demonstrate the utility of their approach to determine topics in online moral dilemmas.
DBLP:conf/icwsm/NguyenLTSCKX22.dataDomainOtherText: AITA subreddit (moral dilemmas in everyday situations)
